content: निरुक्त {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Expressed, pronounced, explained, defined. {@--2@} Loud, distinct. --क्तं {@--1@} Explanation, derivation, etymological interpretation. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of one of the six Vedāṅgas, that which contains glossarial explanation of obscure words, especially those occurring in the Vedas; नाम च धातुजमाह निरुक्ते <ls>Nir.</ls> {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a celebrated commentary on the Nighaṇṭus by Yāska.
